src_original: brtshigs rgyar ni khru gang la/_/zabs su khru phyed zlum pos bskor/_/sor bzhi
gsum ni dor byas la/_/rdo rje dbus su brgyad pa'i tshhad/_/thab khung dkar

po rgyab tu me ri'o/_/steng du rdo rje phyi rol 'od zer dkar/_/bud shing dkar po khru gang tshhad/_/tshan+dan dkar po 'o mas spangs te bzhag_/mchod sbyin shing ni mdzub gang tshhad/_/'dab ma dang bcas rtshe mo'i ngos/_/sngar bzhin spangs
tgt_original: ཐབ་ཁུང་དཀར་པོ་རྒྱབ་ཏུ་མེ་རིའོ་༎ སྟེང་དུ་རྡོ་རྗེ་ཕྱི་རོལ་འོད་ཟེར་དཀར་༎ བུད་ཤིང་དཀར་པོ་ཁྲུ་གང་ཚད་༎ ཙནདན་དཀར་པོ་འོ་མས་སྤངས་ཏེ་བཞག་། མཆོད་སྦྱིན་ཤིང་ནི་མཛུབ་གང་ཚད་༎ འདབ་མ་དང་བཅས་རྩེ་མོའི་ངོས་༎ སྔར་བཞིན་སྤངས་པས་ཡམ་ཤིང་བྱ་།

src_original: pas yam shing bya/_/dkar gsum mngar gsum mar gyi 'og_/'bras chan 'bru ni sna tshhogs dang /_/ku sha yon chab g.yas su gzhag_/me tog la sogs bsang gtor dang /_/zhal bsil rnams ni g.yon du gzhag_/dgang gzar
dang ni blugs gzar gnyis/_/mtshhan nyid rgyas par gzhan du bstan/_/yang
na g.yas kyi sor mo bskum pa las/_/yi ge hum gi 'od zer de yis ni/_/rdo rje
can gyi 'od zer bkug pa yis/_/rdul bshig ye shes gong bu las/_/rdo rje
khro bo'i dgang gzar gyur/_/g.yon gyi mthe bos mthe chung mnan/_/gong
bzhin sbyangs nas blugs gzar gyur/_/de nyid rdo rje dril ni mdun/_//de nas
dkar po'i rgyan cha bgo/_/yid dang mthun pa'i ku sha'i steng /_/sems
dpa'i skyil krung shar du blta/_/thab sogs tshan+dan chus gtor te/_/bud
shing ma nor zlum por brtshig_/de nas rtshwa ni ku sha la/_/om a mr-i ta kun+da li
sarba bihu~m na sha ya hum phat/_las kyi sngags kyis bsang gtor bya/_/bum sbyangs bskyed dgug bzlas pa yis/_/rtsha gcig bdun gyis 'od zer dgang /_/
thab kyi kho ra khor yug la/_/ku sha'i rtshe mo phyi ru bstan/_/de nas lha yi rnal
'byor ni/_/cho ga lnga'am cho ga gsum/_/skad cig bsdus rgyas shes par bya/_/
thab la sogs pa'i man ngag kyang /_/las kyi tshhogs su shes par bya/_/de yang
slob dpon man ngag gtsho/_/bram ze'i khyim mam gtshub shing me_/rlung
g.yab kyis sbar las kyis bsang /_/sbyang zhing bskyed nas ram dkar pos/_/me
lha dkar po drang srong zhi ba'i tshhul/_/tshhangs pa'i skud pa dkar por ldan/
phyag na  dbyug pa bgrang phreng dang /_//_/skyabs sbyin bsnams pa'o/_/'od
'phros sngar bzhin spyan drangs te/_/om ba pa ka ag ye a gatsh+tshha ya a gatsh+tshha ya/
ma ma shan+tim ku ru swa ha/_lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drang ngo /_/
bgegs bgegs bsnyims te mchod pa dbul/_/rtsha sngags nyid la mchod sngags
btags te dbul/_/om ba pa ka ag+na ye/_che ge mo shan+tim ku ru swa ha/_zhes
sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o/_/de yi man ngag 'od zer ni/_/sum skor du ni bya ba
dang /_/nyis skor du ni bya ba dang /_/bdag nyid rab tu shes par bya/_/
bzhi skor dag dang slob ma'o/_/'od zer dkar po 'phros pa las/_/thugs
dang snying ga brgyud pa dang /_/gsum nas ngag la brgyud pa dang /_/dbu

nas mgo la brgyud pa yi/_/lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang /_/rtsha ba gsum 'dus bskang bar bya/_/spyi bo'i gtshug nas brtshams nas ni/_/sdig dang srin bu zad pa'i phyir/_/dmar pos bsreg cing dkar pos bkru/_/sgo dgu
dag nas bsdu ba dang /_/thams cad kun nas bsdu ba dang /_/snying gar bsdus nas dbyung ba dang /_/til gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/_/sdig
pa'i gzugs la de gzhug bya/_/rdzas rnams bdud rtshis mchod pas ni/_/de
nas sdig pa de bsreg bya/_/yang na rdzas la bstems te bsreg_/nad rnams sbyin sreg gi tshho ga
zhi bar byed pa ni/_/nad kyi ming nas smos nas ni/_/gong ma de bzhin bsreg
pa 'am/_/nad kyi ming dang gzugs bris la/_/'od zer dmar pos bsregs
nas ni/_/dkar pos sbyang zhing zhi bsams la/_/'byung ba'i dgra rnams de
bzhin bsam/_/'byung po kun dang dgra kun yang /_/'od zer bkye bas zhi
bar bsam/_/gzugs dang ming bris zhi bar bya/_/sreg rdzas bdud rtshi 'od
gsum dang /_/yam shing dkar po zho can dang /_/de la sogs pa'i thun
zhal nas shes par bya/_/bdun nam nyi shu rtsha gcig dag/brgya rtsha brgyad ni bsdus rgyas pa'o/_/rtsha lnga lnga bcu brgya yis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa zhi bar
shin tu che gyur stong gi bar/_/de yis sdig dang bsod nams ni/_/che chung
